mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_id AS cart_id, c.user_id AS user_id, p.product_id As product_id, p.product_name AS product_name, c.amount, p.product_price AS product_price, (p.product_price * c.amount) money, m.user_name AS user_name FROM cart c LEFT JOIN product p ON p.product_id = c.product_id LEFT JOIN user m ON m.user_id = c.user_id WHERE c.user_id = #{user_id} ORDER BY c.cart_id
SELECT NVL(SUM(product_price * amount), 0) money FROM cart c LEFT JOIN product p ON c.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.user_id =#{user_id}
